Package org.mrpdaemon.sec.encfs

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EncFSFileProvider
    An EncFSFileProvider provides an abstraction for accessing file contents and information in their encrypted form on a local disk or any other storage type.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DirectConfigBuilder
    To avoid editing the EncFS implementation directly, this class was implemented for creating a config file without directly using a file provider.
    EncFSBase64
    Static class to perform Base64 encoding/decoding
    EncFSConfig
    Class representing an EncFS volume configuration.
    EncFSConfigFactory
    Class for creating EncFSConfig objects
    EncFSConfigParser
    Parser methods that read and interpret EncFS configuration files.
    EncFSConfigWriter
    Writer methods that write an EncFSConfig into a file
    EncFSCrypto
    Class containing static methods implementing crypto functionality for the rest of the library
    EncFSFile
    Object representing a file in an EncFS volume.
    EncFSFileInfo
    Class representing information about an underlying file
    EncFSFileInputStream
    FileInputStream abstraction that allows decrypted data to be read from a file on an EncFS volume.
    EncFSFileOutputStream
    FilterOutputStream abstraction that allows writing encrypted data to a file on an EncFS volume.
    EncFSInputStream
    FilterInputStream extension that allows decrypted data to be read from a file on an EncFS volume.
    EncFSLocalFileProvider
    Class implementing an EncFSFileProvider for accessing the local filesystem

    Note that all path parameters are relative to the rootPath provided to the constructor.
    EncFSOutputStream
    FilterOutputStream extension that allows encrypted data to be written to a file on an EncFS volume.
    EncFSPBKDF2Provider
    Abstract class for providing a custom PBKDF2 implementation
    EncFSProgressListener
    Class representing a progress listener for long running operations
    EncFSUtil
    Class containing static methods implementing misc. functionality for the rest of the library
    EncFSVolume
    Class representing an EncFS volume.
    EncFSVolumeBuilder
    Class for building EncFSVolume objects and writing new volume files to file providers.
    EncFSVolumeBuilder.ConfigBuilder  
    EncFSVolumeBuilder.FileProviderBuilder  
    EncFSVolumeBuilder.PasswordBuilder  
    EncFSVolumeBuilder.Pbkdf2ProviderBuilder  
    NullFilenameDecryptionStrategy  
    NullFilenameEncryptionStrategy  
    OpenPBKDF2Provider
    For compatibility with Java versions that don't include the PBKDF2 algorithm, a method from cryptofreek was used and implemented here.
    SimulatedFileProvider
    This file provider can be used to implement the EncFS methods without any real file system access.
    StreamCrypto  
    StreamFilenameDecryptionStrategy  
    StreamFilenameEncryptionStrategy  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    EncFSFilenameEncryptionAlgorithm
    Enum representing the filename encryption algorithms used in EncFS
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    EncFSChecksumException  
    EncFSCorruptDataException  
    EncFSException  
    EncFSInvalidConfigException  
    EncFSInvalidPasswordException  
    EncFSUnsupportedException
